RPG 3D Multiplayer Game.shortDescription: A feature-rich RPG game with an immersive open-world experience, multiplayer support, and a dynamic trading system.
RPG 3D Multiplayer Game.description: "RPG 3D Multiplayer" is an open-world role-playing game where players can explore vast landscapes, complete quests, engage in combat, and interact with other players in real-time. The game features a detailed inventory system, a dynamic market for trading items, and challenging AI-controlled enemies. Players can also join dungeons, battle powerful bosses, and upgrade their skills for a more immersive gameplay experience. Built with Unity and utilizing Netcode for GameObjects (NGO), Firebase, and AI-driven behaviors, this game delivers a smooth and engaging multiplayer experience.
features: Seamless open-world exploration with interactive NPCs
Real-time multiplayer system with smooth player synchronization
Challenging AI enemies using FSM for realistic behavior
Optimized performance with LOD, Object Pooling, and Async Scene Loading
Firebase integration for real-time data synchronization and authentication
Network Culling for efficient multiplayer interactions

3D Horror Game.shortDescription: A thrilling survival horror game where players must outsmart AI-controlled enemies and survive the night.
3D Horror Game.description: "3D Horror Game" is an immersive survival horror experience inspired by the legendary "Five Nights at Freddy’s". Players find themselves trapped in his room with a mysterious and terrifying animatronics that come to life at night. Using limited resources, players must survive the night, and avoid being detected by the ever-watchful AI enemies. With real-time decision-making, players will face intense dilemmas that affect the game’s multiple endings. Atmospheric lighting, dynamic sound effects, and a gripping storyline enhance the tension, making every moment a heart-pounding challenge. Explore the unknown, uncover dark secrets, and survive the horror before it's too late!
features: Multiple endings based on player choices

Co Tuong Game.shortDescription: A feature-rich Chinese Chess game for Android with AI opponent and local multiplayer support.
Co Tuong Game.description: "Co Tuong - Local Chinese Chess" is a digital recreation of the traditional Chinese Chess game, designed for both solo and local multiplayer play. Players can engage in single-player mode against a challenging AI opponent or two-player mode to battle against a friend on the same device. The game features a real-time move validation, and an undo function for better gameplay control. With a beautifully designed chessboard, smooth animations, and clear game rules, Xiangqi brings the classic game into the digital era while preserving its authentic gameplay experience.
features: Single-player mode against AI (Minimax + Alpha-Beta Pruning)
Local multiplayer mode (two players on the same device)
Game history tracking for reviewing past moves

Classic Pikachu.participants: WinForms C# | Duration: 2 weeks | Solo Project
Classic Pikachu.shortDescription: A fun and nostalgic tile-matching game where players connect identical Pokémon tiles using a limited number of straight lines.
Classic Pikachu.description: "Classic Pikachu" is a nostalgic tile-matching game built using WinForms (C# .NET). Players must connect identical Pokémon tiles within a limited number of straight lines to clear the board. The game offers multiple difficulty levels, a scoring system, and a hint feature to assist players. Built with simplicity and efficiency, this game brings back childhood memories while running smoothly on Windows devices.
features: Multiple difficulty levels with increasing challenge

Pi Store Management.participants: WinForms C# | Thời gian: 1 month | Dự án cá nhân
Pi Store Management.shortDescription: A Windows-based inventory management application designed for small to medium-sized businesses.
Pi Store Management.description: "Pi Store Management System" is a Windows desktop application built with WinForms (C# .NET) to streamline inventory and stock management. The application provides real-time tracking of stock levels, supplier and customer management, and detailed reporting. Users can add, update, and remove products from the system, generate invoices, and monitor sales trends. With an intuitive UI, barcode scanning integration, and multi-user authentication, this application is designed to optimize inventory control and improve operational efficiency for small to medium businesses.
features: PDF and CSV report generation for sales analysis

E-Commerce Website.participants: ASP.NET Core | Duration: 2 months | Team Size: 2
E-Commerce Website.shortDescription: A full-fledged online shopping platform with secure payment integration, order tracking, and an intuitive admin dashboard.
E-Commerce Website.description: "E-Commerce Website" is a full-featured online shopping platform developed using ASP.NET Core. The website supports product management, user authentication, order processing, and secure payment integration. Customers can browse through categories, add products to their cart, and complete purchases using various payment methods. Admin users can manage products, monitor sales, and generate reports through a dedicated dashboard. The system also includes a recommendation engine to enhance user experience and increase conversions.
features: Product catalog with categories and search functionality
Admin dashboard for managing products, users, and orders
Responsive design for desktop and mobile

Flashcard App.participants: Android Studio (Java) | Duration: 1.5 months | Team Size: 2
Flashcard App.shortDescription: An interactive flashcard-based mobile app designed to help users improve their English vocabulary efficiently with spaced repetition and engaging quizzes.
Flashcard App.description: "English Flashcards" is a mobile application developed using Android Studio (Java), aimed at enhancing English vocabulary learning through an interactive flashcard system. The app incorporates spaced repetition, ensuring that users review words at optimal intervals for long-term retention. Users can explore predefined word sets, create custom flashcards, and take quizzes to test their knowledge. The user-friendly interface, progress tracking, and learning streak system make learning more engaging and effective.
features: Flashcard-based learning system with spaced repetition
Predefined word sets categorized by difficulty and topics
Custom flashcards creation and personal word collections
Daily word notifications and learning streak tracking
Online support with Azure SQL Database and PHP backend
